FuncDef:
The local-backup userinfo-limit command configures the maximum number of users whose information can be backed up.
The undo local-backup userinfo-limit command restores the default configuration.
By default, a maximum of 128000 users' information can be backed up.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the maximum number of users whose information can be backed up.
The value is an integer ranging from 1 to 128, in units of 1000. The default value is 128.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
When user backup information reaches the default specification, many memory resources are consumed. To reduce memory usage, run the local-backup userinfo-limit command to configure the maximum number of users whose information can be backed up.
Precautions
In VS mode, this command is supported only by the admin VS.
